channel.title: VPS Opinions
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
In my effort to establish a semi-popular server, I am looking for a well-worth VPS. The VPS must be between $20-30 and be very suitable for a 317 AllstarScape source (probably doesn't matter what source, but I'm being specific).
I've heard of VPSland's popularity. Which one from there would be the best? Do you know of any other VPS sites with great quality and deals? Is a Linux VPS better than a Windows VPS? 2003 vs 2008? Hit me with what you got!
Thank you,
TheCyberMan
